name: Mistral AI
description: Open and efficient large language models with API access to Mistral 7B, Mixtral, and frontier models. Strong on multilingual tasks and function calling.

name: Cohere
description: Enterprise NLP platform with LLMs for text generation, embeddings, classification, and RAG. Offers Command, Embed, and Rerank models.

name: Together AI
description: Cloud platform for running and fine-tuning open-source LLMs including Llama, Mistral, and more. Fast inference at scale.

name: Fireworks AI
description: High-performance inference API for open-source LLMs. Sub-second latency for Llama, Mixtral, and custom models with function calling support.

name: Groq
description: Ultra-fast LLM inference using custom LPU hardware. Runs Llama, Mixtral, and Gemma at hundreds of tokens per second via OpenAI-compatible API.

name: Perplexity AI
description: LLM API with built-in web search grounding. Models return cited, real-time answers. Supports sonar and sonar-pro model families.

name: DeepSeek
description: High-capability LLM API from DeepSeek including DeepSeek-V3 and DeepSeek-R1 reasoning model. OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

name: xAI / Grok
description: xAI's Grok LLM API with real-time X/Twitter data access. Supports Grok-2 and vision models with OpenAI-compatible interface.

name: Leonardo AI
description: AI image generation API with fine-tuned models for game assets, concept art, and product images. Offers ControlNet, image-to-image, and upscaling.

name: Ideogram
description: AI image generation API specializing in text rendering within images. High accuracy for logos, posters, and typography-heavy graphics.

name: Black Forest Labs (Flux)
description: FLUX image generation models API including FLUX.1 Pro, Dev, and Schnell. State-of-the-art photorealism and prompt adherence.

name: OpenAI DALL-E
description: DALL-E 3 image generation API via OpenAI. Creates high-quality images from text prompts with editing and variation endpoints.

name: Midjourney API
description: Access Midjourney's image generation via unofficial/third-party API wrappers. No official API exists yet; use proxy services like UseAPI or GoAPI.

name: Deepgram
description: AI-powered speech-to-text API with real-time and batch transcription, speaker diarization, language detection, and audio intelligence features.

name: OpenAI Whisper API
description: OpenAI's Whisper speech-to-text API supporting 57 languages with transcription and translation endpoints.

name: PlayHT
description: AI voice generation API with 900+ ultra-realistic voices for text-to-speech, voice cloning, and real-time streaming audio.

name: Resemble AI
description: Voice cloning and AI speech synthesis API. Clone any voice from audio samples and generate custom speech with emotional control.

name: Murf AI
description: AI voice generator API with 120+ studio-quality voices in 20+ languages for voiceovers, e-learning, and product demos.

name: Runway ML
description: AI video generation and editing API. Gen-2 and Gen-3 Alpha for text-to-video, image-to-video, and video-to-video transformations.

name: Pika Labs
description: AI video generation API for creating and editing videos from text or images. Supports motion controls and character consistency.

name: Luma AI (Dream Machine)
description: High-quality AI video generation API by Luma AI. Creates cinematic videos from text prompts or reference images with camera controls.

name: HeyGen
description: AI video avatar generation API. Create talking-head videos with custom avatars, voice cloning, and multi-language lip sync.

name: Synthesia
description: AI video generation API with digital human avatars. Produce professional videos in 120+ languages without cameras or actors.

name: D-ID
description: AI-powered video and avatar generation API. Animate still photos, create talking avatars, and produce personalized video messages at scale.

name: Banana Dev
description: Serverless GPU inference platform for deploying custom ML models. Pay-per-inference with cold-start optimization for production workloads.

name: Modal
description: Cloud infrastructure for ML training and inference. Run Python functions on GPUs with auto-scaling, no Docker required.

name: AWS Bedrock
description: Fully managed AWS service for building GenAI applications. Access Claude, Llama, Titan, Stable Diffusion, and more via unified API.

name: Azure OpenAI Service
description: Microsoft Azure-hosted OpenAI models including GPT-4, DALL-E, and Whisper with enterprise compliance, private networking, and SLAs.

name: Google Cloud Vision API
description: Detect objects, faces, text, landmarks, and explicit content in images. Includes OCR, logo detection, and image classification.

name: AWS Rekognition
description: Amazon's image and video analysis service. Detect objects, celebrities, text, and unsafe content. Includes facial analysis and recognition.

name: AI21 Labs (Jamba)
description: Enterprise LLM API with Jamba (hybrid SSM-Transformer) and Jurassic models. Optimized for long-context tasks and document understanding.

name: Writer
description: Enterprise AI writing platform API with Palmyra LLMs optimized for business content. Includes RAG, function calling, and knowledge graph features.

name: TextRazor
description: NLP API for entity extraction, relation detection, topic classification, and dependency parsing. Processes text in 15+ languages.

name: Weaviate
description: Open-source vector database with cloud-hosted API. Semantic search, hybrid search, and generative AI integration for RAG applications.

name: Qdrant
description: High-performance vector similarity search engine with cloud API. Supports filtering, payload storage, and multitenancy for production RAG.

name: Chroma
description: Open-source embedding database with cloud-hosted API. Built for AI applications requiring semantic search and document storage.

name: Algolia
description: Hosted search and discovery API. Lightning-fast full-text search with typo tolerance, filters, and AI-powered personalization for apps.

name: Meilisearch
description: Open-source search engine with cloud API. Instant search with typo tolerance, filtering, and geosearch. Self-host or use Meilisearch Cloud.

name: Fal.ai
description: Serverless GPU platform for running AI models via API. Hosts FLUX, LoRA fine-tunes, Whisper, and 100+ models with fast cold starts.

name: Cerebras
description: Ultra-fast LLM inference API using wafer-scale chip technology. Runs Llama-3 and other models at 2000+ tokens/second.

name: Samba Nova
description: Enterprise AI inference API with SambaNova SN40L chips. Delivers fast inference for Llama-3 and Meta models at scale.

name: PayPal
description: Global payments API for accepting online payments, subscriptions, invoicing, and payouts. Supports PayPal Wallet, cards, and BNPL (Pay Later).

name: Braintree
description: PayPal-owned payments gateway API for cards, PayPal, Venmo, and wallets. Full-stack solution with client SDKs and webhooks.

name: Adyen
description: Enterprise payments API processing cards, wallets, and local payment methods in 200+ countries. Unified commerce for online and in-person.

name: Wise (formerly TransferWise)
description: International money transfer and multi-currency account API. Send, receive, and convert money at mid-market exchange rates.

name: Checkout.com
description: Global payments platform API for card processing, alternative payments, and fraud prevention. Strong in Europe, Middle East, and Asia-Pacific.

name: MX Technologies
description: Financial data aggregation API connecting to 16,000+ financial institutions. Account verification, transaction enrichment, and money insights.

name: Yodlee
description: Bank-level financial data aggregation API from Envestnet. Account data, transaction history, investment data, and income verification.

name: Finicity (Mastercard Open Banking)
description: Open banking API for account aggregation, income verification, and cash flow analytics. Powers mortgage and lending decisions.

name: Tink (Visa Open Banking)
description: European open banking API for account aggregation, payment initiation, and financial data. Connects 3,400+ banks across Europe.

name: Moralis
description: Web3 development API for blockchain data across EVM chains. Wallet balances, NFTs, transactions, DeFi positions, and real-time streams.

name: Interactive Brokers API
description: Broker API for trading stocks, options, futures, forex, and bonds. REST (Client Portal) and FIX/TWS APIs for automated trading strategies.

name: Chargebee
description: Subscription billing and revenue management API. Manage plans, coupons, invoices, and revenue recognition for SaaS businesses.

name: Recurly
description: Subscription management API for recurring billing, dunning management, and revenue recovery. Supports 20+ payment gateways.

name: Paddle
description: Payments infrastructure API for SaaS companies. Acts as merchant of record handling tax, VAT, and compliance globally.

name: Lemon Squeezy
description: Payments and subscriptions API for digital products and SaaS. Built-in tax compliance, license keys, and affiliate system.

name: Persona
description: Identity verification and KYC API. Document verification, selfie checks, database verification, and continuous monitoring for compliance.

name: Onfido
description: AI-powered identity verification API. Document and biometric checks with global coverage for KYC/AML compliance workflows.

name: Jumio
description: Automated identity verification and eKYC API. Real-time document authentication and biometric liveness detection in 200+ countries.

name: Sardine
description: Fraud prevention and compliance API for fintech. Device intelligence, behavior biometrics, and real-time risk scoring for onboarding and payments.

name: Stripe Tax
description: Automated global tax calculation and filing API. Compute, collect, and report sales tax, VAT, and GST across 40+ countries.

name: Open Exchange Rates
description: Reliable currency exchange rates and conversion API. 200+ currencies with historical data going back to 1999.

name: Render API
description: Deploy and manage cloud services on Render via REST API. Trigger deploys, manage services, environment variables, and databases.

name: Fly.io API
description: Global app deployment API. Deploy Docker containers to 30+ regions with machines API, volumes, networking, and autoscaling.

name: Deno Deploy API
description: Serverless JavaScript/TypeScript edge deployment API. Deploy Deno scripts globally with CI/CD integration and custom domains.

name: PlanetScale API
description: Serverless MySQL-compatible database with branching workflow. API for managing databases, branches, deploy requests, and schema changes.

name: Neon
description: Serverless Postgres with branching. Scale to zero, instant branches for dev/test, and API for managing projects, branches, and databases.

name: Turso
description: SQLite at the edge via libSQL API. Distributed SQLite databases with multi-region replication and HTTP API for serverless apps.

name: Xata
description: Serverless database API combining Postgres, search, and analytics. Schema management, full-text search, and vector support in one platform.

name: CockroachDB Serverless API
description: Distributed SQL database API. Deploy globally consistent Postgres-compatible databases with automatic scaling and zero downtime.

name: Clerk
description: Drop-in authentication and user management API. Handles sign-in, MFA, organizations, and session management with pre-built UI components.

name: WorkOS
description: Enterprise authentication API for SSO (SAML/OIDC), Directory Sync, SCIM, and Admin Portal. Sell to enterprises faster.

name: Descope
description: No-code authentication platform API for passwordless login, MFA, SSO, and passkeys. Drag-and-drop flow builder with SDK support.

name: Resend
description: Developer-first transactional email API built for modern applications. Send with custom domains, React email templates, and webhooks.

name: Amazon SES
description: AWS cloud email sending service for transactional, marketing, and bulk email. Pay-per-email pricing with delivery analytics.

name: Loops
description: Email platform API designed for SaaS products. Send transactional emails, onboarding sequences, and newsletters to your users.

name: Grafana Cloud API
description: Managed observability stack API. Metrics (Prometheus), logs (Loki), traces (Tempo), and alerting via unified Grafana interface.

name: BetterStack (Logtail)
description: Uptime monitoring and log management API. Monitor HTTP endpoints, ping checks, on-call routing, and structured log ingestion.

name: Axiom
description: Serverless log management and observability API. Ingest billions of events, query with APL, and monitor with dashboards. Zero-ops.

name: GitHub Actions API
description: Automate GitHub Actions workflows via REST API. Trigger runs, manage secrets, artifacts, and self-hosted runners programmatically.

name: Buildkite
description: CI/CD platform API for managing pipelines, builds, agents, and artifacts. Hybrid model runs agents on your own infrastructure.

name: Depot
description: Remote Docker build API. 10-40x faster Docker builds using persistent caching and high-performance Intel/ARM builders.

name: LaunchDarkly
description: Feature flag management API for controlled rollouts, A/B testing, and kill switches. Real-time flag delivery with targeting rules.

name: Flagsmith
description: Open-source feature flag and remote config API. Manage features with segments, multivariate flags, and integrations. Self-host or cloud.

name: PostHog
description: Product analytics and feature flags API. Capture events, manage feature flags, A/B tests, session recordings, and user surveys.

name: Unleash
description: Open-source feature toggle API with enterprise controls. Gradual rollouts, strategies, metrics, and SDKs for any language.

name: Sanity
description: Headless CMS with real-time API (GROQ). Structured content platform with live collaboration and portable text for any front-end.

name: Strapi
description: Open-source headless CMS REST and GraphQL API. Self-host or use Strapi Cloud. Customizable content types with role-based access.

name: Hygraph (formerly GraphCMS)
description: GraphQL-native headless CMS API. Federated content infrastructure with content modeling, localization, and webhooks.

name: Payload CMS
description: Open-source headless CMS and application framework with REST and GraphQL APIs. Code-first content modeling with TypeScript.

name: Ably
description: Realtime messaging API for pub/sub, presence, and history. Globally distributed with guaranteed message ordering and delivery.

name: PartyKit
description: Realtime collaborative applications API built on Cloudflare Workers and Durable Objects. WebSocket rooms for multiplayer and sync.

name: Inngest
description: Event-driven function scheduling API. Run reliable background jobs, scheduled functions, and multi-step workflows with automatic retries.

name: Temporal
description: Durable workflow orchestration API. Run fault-tolerant long-running workflows with retries, timers, and signals in any language.

name: Hookdeck
description: Webhook management API. Receive, filter, transform, and retry webhooks reliably. Includes ingest, routing, and observability.

name: Trigger.dev
description: Open-source background jobs and workflow API. Write long-running tasks in code with retry logic, scheduling, and real-time observability.

name: Cloudflare AI
description: Run AI inference at the edge via Cloudflare Workers AI API. Access LLMs, image generation, embeddings, and speech recognition globally.

name: Nvidia NIM
description: NVIDIA Inference Microservices API for running optimized AI models. Llama, Mistral, Stable Diffusion, and more on NVIDIA GPUs.

name: Google Imagen API
description: Google's state-of-the-art text-to-image generation API via Vertex AI. Photorealistic and artistic image generation with editing capabilities.

name: Tavily
description: AI-optimized search API built for LLM agents. Returns clean, relevant search results with source citations for RAG and research agents.

name: Exa AI
description: Neural search API for LLMs. Find and retrieve web content using meaning-based search with clean text extraction for AI pipelines.

name: Browserbase
description: Headless browser infrastructure API for AI agents. Run Playwright/Puppeteer at scale with stealth, proxies, and session recording.

name: E2B
description: Secure cloud sandboxes API for AI code execution. Run AI-generated code safely in isolated environments with file system and internet access.

name: Upstash QStash
description: HTTP-based message queue and scheduler API. Publish messages, schedule tasks, and handle retries for serverless applications.

name: Tinybird
description: Real-time analytics API platform. Publish high-volume event data and expose it as low-latency REST API endpoints for product analytics.

name: Langfuse
description: LLM observability and prompt management API. Trace LLM calls, evaluate outputs, manage prompts, and monitor AI application quality.

name: LlamaIndex Cloud
description: Managed RAG pipeline API. Parse documents, build indexes, and query data with LlamaIndex infrastructure without managing servers.

name: Vapi
description: Voice AI API for building phone call agents. Make and receive calls with custom AI voice agents, STT, TTS, and real-time conversation.

name: Retell AI
description: AI voice agent API for phone calls. Build and deploy voice bots with low latency, interruption handling, and custom LLM integration.

name: Hume AI
description: Empathic AI API that understands emotional expression in voice, face, and language. Emotional intelligence for voice agents and chatbots.

name: Jina AI
description: Multimodal AI API for embeddings, reranking, and grounded search. Reader API converts web URLs to clean markdown for LLM ingestion.

name: Voyage AI
description: Best-in-class embedding models API optimized for retrieval and RAG. Domain-specific models for code, legal, and finance text.

name: Novita AI
description: Affordable AI inference API for 100+ open-source models. Image generation, LLM inference, and video AI at competitive per-token pricing.

name: Railway API
description: Deploy applications, databases, and services via Railway GraphQL API. Manage environments, variables, deployments, and domains.

name: Courier
description: Multi-channel notification API for email, SMS, push, Slack, and more. Single API for all notification channels with routing logic.

name: Novu
description: Open-source notification infrastructure API. Manage in-app, email, SMS, push, and chat notifications with workflow engine.

name: Cloudflare Workers API
description: Deploy serverless functions at the edge via Cloudflare API. Manage Workers, KV storage, Durable Objects, and R2 object storage.

name: Checkly
description: Monitoring as code API. Synthetic monitoring for APIs and web apps using Playwright. Schedule checks and get alerts on failures.

name: Highlight.io
description: Full-stack monitoring API for session replay, error tracking, and logs. Works across frontend and backend with OpenTelemetry.

name: Google Gemini API
description: Google's multimodal Gemini API via Google AI Studio. Access Gemini 2.5 Pro, Flash, and experimental models with 1M context windows.
